screen.discordloom.login.title: Discord Login Required
text.discordloom.disconnect.profile: There was an error while trying to fetch your profile, please try again later.
text.discordloom.disconnect.luckperms: There was an error while trying to fetch your LuckPerms user, please try again later.
text.discordloom.disconnect.profile.offl: There was an error while trying to fetch your Minecraft profile, please make sure your session is valid and try again later.
text.discordloom.disconnect.relink: This Discord account is already linked to %s Minecraft account!
text.discordloom.disconnect.discord: There was an error while trying to fetch your Discord user, please try again later.
text.discordloom.disconnect.channel.text: You are not in the required discord channel to join this server.
text.discordloom.disconnect.channel.voic: You are not in a mandatory voice channel to join this server.
text.discordloom.connect.message: For playing on this server, you need to link your account. Please click on the button bellow to link your account
text.discordloom.connect.link_button: Click here to link your account
text.discordloom.connect.failed: Error during linking process, manual linking is required contact the server owner
text.discordloom.connect.browser_clipboa: If your browser didn't open, paste the link in your clipboard in your browser
